text: Ifor Huw Irranca-Davies ( Davies; born 22 January 1963) is a Welsh Labour and Co-operative politician. He has been the Member of the Senedd for Ogmore since 2016. He was also the Member of Parliament (MP) for Ogmore from 2002 to 2016. Irranca-Davies was born in Gowerton, Swansea. He was named after his step great-uncle, Ifor Davies, also a Welsh Labour politician. On marriage, he and wife Joanna Irranca both changed their surnames to Irranca-Davies. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:Members of the British House of Commons for Welsh constituencies Category:Politicians from Swansea Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:UK MPs 2005–2010 Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017
title: Huw Irranca-Davies
